import{createSlice,configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";// import { createStore } from "redux";
var initialState={counter:0,showCounter:true};var counterSlice=createSlice({name:'anyName',initialState:initialState,reducers:{increment:function increment(state){state.counter++;},increase:function increase(state,action){state.counter=state.counter+action.payload;},decrement:function decrement(state){state.counter--;},reset:function reset(state){state.counter=0;},toggleCounter:function toggleCounter(state){state.showCounter=!state.showCounter;}}});var store=configureStore({reducer:counterSlice.reducer});export var counterActions=counterSlice.actions;export default store;
